content:
We will have another "social hour" at today's CTCFT! Post ideas for breakout rooms here! Don't use this topic for general chatter, though.

React to ideas you're interested in with a :+1: emoji
An idea based on the roundtable, there will be (at least) 4 working/interest groups attending, so it might be nice to have rooms for game dev/embedded/machine learning/cryptography?
